answers.answer: I failed first but passed second my Dr says 85% fails first test
You know what I say hon ;)

I would say the little soda didnt affect it. The morning of my test I had a sprite and a big breakfast and went in for my normally appt and my dr realized I hadnt done my glucose test yet so I did it right then and there and I passed .
Wow 85% I had no idea that many failed. Oh well that makes me feel better. And shasta thanks for making me feel better today to. Jeeze I worry to much.
I failed the first one and passed the second. I was told its not too big of a deal because the first one isnt as sensitive of a test.
Maybe you worry to much..but it just shows how much you care ;)
They said the day before minimize my sugar intake, oh well if I have it, I have it. My cousin said she failed her first one with both kids but passed the second one.
My sister failed the first one but passed the second one. Its fairly common.
I failed my first but passed my second :))

I just took mine on friday and my dr didnt say anything about not eating or drinking certain things for the one hr test... He said only for the three hr test... Im waiting for my results... How long doea it take??

question: So my one hour that I took weeks ago came back high. Supposed to be in the 135 range and it was 175.. they cant get me in till next week to do the test. Has anybody failed the first test but passed the second one? I did accidently take a sip of watered down soda before the test not thinking and ate a tiny piece of cheese cause I felt woozy. I know stupid, cause now Im going to worry about this and its my fault.
title: gestational diabetes
